name: Troll Roll
description: Troll Roll is a top-down puzzle game, where you have to help our troll friend face the challenges of an ever-changing mystical forest. The troll keeps trying to reach his house, while facing the challenges of a diabolical die. This game aims to challenge the thinking capability of a player, with multiple mechanics working together to create challenges in a seemingly simple world.  From meeting gate conditions, tunneling through levels and successfully completing levels within a set time, the player is kept on their toes. CONTROLS: WASD/ Arrow keys to move This game was made within 48 hours, for the biggest game making marathon, GMTK game jam 2022 We hope you enjoy your experience! :)
